Introductions and Documentation

  • Introduction to Discovery Engine: His Noble Numbers

    Alireza Taheri Araghi et al.
    An introduction to the Discovery Engine, which allows you to probe similarities between texts in the EEBO-TCP corpus

  • Introduction to MorphAdorner

    Meredith Kelling et al.
    A description of MorphAdorner, a natural language processing package which was developed at Northwestern University and which powers EarlyPrint

  • Introduction to EEBO-TCP

    Alireza Taheri Araghi et al.
    A brief introduction to Early English Books Online and the Text Creation Partnership

  • Introduction to NUPOS

    Alireza Taheri Araghi et al.
    A summary of the Northwestern University Part of Speech (NUPOS) tagset used in the MorphAdorner software

  • Introduction to the N-gram Browser

    Anupam Basu
    An introduction to the N-gram Browser
